name: My Car Salon 2
description:
Wrench and the gang are back to fire up more cars in the sequel to the mammoth hit My Car Salon! All the customers from the first game have been served, the dust has settled, and now Wrench and his colleagues want to turn their auto service center into a global empire!

Wrench, Lube, Socket, Flat, Ratchet, Pliers, Torque, and Hammer now run nine branches of their popular car salon. With new recruits to be added and better equipment to keep cars in top shape, the vehicles that pass through this salon are in for one heck of a ride! Can our brave mechanics meet the demand and live up to their reputation? Time to check the oil and find out in My Car Salon 2!

GAMEPLAY
Our rag-tag team of mechanics must service the cars of increasingly demanding and impatient customers in multiple auto repair shops. Visit any of the nine different branches and help the staff by ushering customers’ cars to different service stations while directing available mechanics to them. You must manage the flow of customers, prioritize tasks, and learn who to service first.

HIGHLIGHTS
- Unique, cartoony art style
- Improved game balance, even more challenging and engaging!
- Addictive time-management gameplay that gets more hectic as you progress
- 9 different auto service centers with varying layouts
- 8 different staff members with their own strengths and weaknesses
- Unique new recruits coming soon!
- Install and upgrade equipment to boost your shop's productivity
- Complete various missions to acquire bonuses
- Upgrade your staff and equipment

** Please note that while the app is free, please be aware that it contains paid content for real money that can be purchased upon users' wish to enhance their gaming experience. **
